short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Winged Monitor receives data from a serial device and saves it to a CSV file. Credits to ChromeDuino for their open source app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Winged Wireless Monitors gives users the ability to read from their serial devices anywhere, anytime.
